title: Doom Bots
body: So i was watching some Keyori videos and started to think, Riot should bring back Doom Bots for The Harrowing, spooky gamemode for a spooky event right?

replies.body: i think so but my questions is why has it been gone so long

Typically it is just a question of priority - we need to take a break from working on whatever the next new mode is to cleanup/bring back a previous mode. Hexakill TT was relatively low effort to bring back, whereas OFA was a lot more (thanks Kalista...). Glad to hear you liked the mode though!

> [{quoted}](name=Nathanm119,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ARhOvL4j,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-19T04:29:29.158+0000)
>
> i think so but my questions is why has it been gone so long

because other game modes have been used instead.

also how was it scary in any way?

Largely the lighting and the general sinister nature of the marketing of it. I dunno about you but Doom is meant to pretty spooky :) And lets be honest, some of those bots (cough Annie/Lux) were pretty damn intimidating.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ARhOvL4j,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-19T05:49:57.550+0000)
>
> Largely the lighting and the general sinister nature of the marketing of it. I dunno about you but Doom is meant to pretty spooky :) And lets be honest, some of those bots (cough Annie/Lux) were pretty damn intimidating.

there's a difference between spooky and intimidating.
Ofc but they can work in tandem. To each their own, depends on your perspective really.
URF doombots would be pretty hectic, we get URF bots get doomified. That's a gamemode I would love to play.
